text: Binɨb ogɨnap, God mɨlek ne kɨlop gek gos pag yɨkɨl, tap teplep God man ne alaŋ nɨb ak dɨl, God Kawnan ne ak agyokek binɨb ogɨnap ayɨp dɨlak. Kɨli God takaw ne ak nɨg dɨl, takaw tep yɨbɨl agɨl gos nɨgɨlak. Pen God kɨles ne dɨl binɨb kɨlop kod yenɨgab ñɨn ak, kɨli kɨles anɨb ak dɨ yelak. Binɨb anɨb okok pen, kɨdek God nop kud ñɨl kelɨgɨl apyap pakɨnɨgabal ak, tɨtay dɨnɨgabal? Kɨli adɨkɨd, tap si tap tɨmel gɨpun ak taynen anɨgɨpun, kelɨgɨnɨgun agɨl, anɨgɨnɨgel tek ma lup. Kɨli tap tɨmel anɨgɨlak ak, God Ñɨne nop mab bak alaŋ chɨpɨl pak tɨbɨk lɨlak tek tepayaŋ gɨlak. Anɨgelak, binɨb okok nop mɨseŋ lɨl agjulak.
